caption.p: Photographic pictures of wound healing process ( A) Changes curve of the wound size ( B) on days 0, 3, 5, 7, 10, and 14 for the all dressings HTCs, HTCs-capsaicin, HTCs-AuNPs and HTCs-capsaicin/AuNPs in addition to the negative (con v-) and positive (Aquacel Â® Ag) control. (CA refers to capsaicin).
